raw_text: CONSULTANT       Summary     Friendly and enthusiastic [Job Title] with [Number] years of specialization in [Type of Restaurant]. Able to learn new tasks quickly and proficient in growing key customer relationships. Represent establishment with friendly, professional demeanor at all times.       Highlights          Detail-oriented team player with strong leadership, advising, consulting and problem resolution skills.  Offer valuable experience in sales and customer service, along with prospecting and account retention.      Maintain excellent interpersonal communication, strategic and tactical problem solving skills.  Excellence in Salesforce CRM, Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Microsoft Office suite. Proficient in Adobe suite. Acquisition of new customers through inbound calls and chats, probing questions and value add of product suite. story:
Let me transform this resume into a story:

Meet a dynamic professional whose career journey spans nearly two decades, beginning with a strong foundation at St. Edward's University, where they maintained exceptional academic performance on the Dean's List from 1998 through 2002, graduating with a Bachelor's in Communications.

Their professional saga began as an Account Executive and Media Consultant, where they cut their teeth in consultative outside sales, consistently hitting revenue targets through various advertising channels. This early experience laid the groundwork for an entrepreneurial chapter as a Sales and Marketing Director, where they built a sales division from scratch and ventured into video and online media.

In a bold move, they took on the role of Owner/Publisher, where they demonstrated remarkable crisis management skills by rescuing a publication in just two weeks, while simultaneously juggling over 100 client projects. Their story continued with a stint as an Account Executive, where they made their mark by presenting over 300 test cases to the State of Connecticut, consistently exceeding monthly goals.

The narrative takes an interesting turn with their role as an Independent Agent for AFLAC, where they mastered the art of outside sales and network building. This led to a position as a Senior Business Consultation specialist, where they became a problem-solving hero, resolving more than 2,000 network disruptions in 2012 alone.

Today, they serve as a Consultant, transforming business operations and contributing significantly to revenue growth - including an impressive $8M contribution by FY13Q2. They're known for their expertise in CRM systems, including Salesforce and Microsoft Dynamics, and their ability to design and deploy complex technical solutions.

Throughout their career journey, they've maintained a consistent thread of excellence in relationship building, problem-solving, and delivering results, while adapting to evolving business landscapes and technologies. Their story is one of continuous growth, adaptability, and successful transformation of challenges into opportunities.

This professional embodies the rare combination of technical expertise, business acumen, and interpersonal skills that make them a valuable asset in any consulting role.
